attributes.action: NOT to sign the European Treaty on March 25th and to hold a referendum on British Citizens views on being a member state of the E.U. as PROMISED in previous manifesto.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not want the Prime Minister to sign away our British, constitutional, heritage on March 25th and be governed by Europe. In addition we demand that the Prime Minister holds the public referendum on European Membership promised on his election to office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
